capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry's lineage is a bit of a mix between being a pure-blood wizard and having some non-magical heritage. I think it's pretty interesting that he has this unique combination of traits, which definitely sets him apart from other wizards in the series.

So, I was reading about Harry's family history and it turns out he has a pretty interesting mix of magical heritage. His parents were Muggle-born wizards, which is pretty rare, but his grandparents on his mother's side were all witches, so that's where the magic comes from in him.
